Class ClientSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientSceneController

  • public class ClientSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
    ClientSceneController objects is responsible for the main GUI; looks specified in the fxml file. Initializes the ClientUnit object and is responsible for all the links between Observable Lists and GUI elements. This object is created by LoginSceneController

    • Method Detail

      • signOut

        public void signOut(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the client and changes the scene to ClientSceneController.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Mouseclick on the button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when there's problem with closing the outputstream or fxml can't be loaded.

      • sendFiles

        public void sendFiles(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Shares specific file with a range of selected users. Uses the ClientUnit's method for sending files. Variable user[0] holds the username, user[1] holds their status (online/offline).
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Mouseclick on the button.

      • customCellFactoryList

        public void customCellFactoryList()
        Sets custom cell factory for the users' list, so it displays their status (online/offline).

      • linkListToFileList

        public void linkListToFileList()
        Adds a listener to the observable list of files, so it's possible to display on JFXListView. Sets the cell factory for JFXListView, so it displays the appropriate extension icon and adds a context menu for sharing.
